entities.description: The frequency of smoking cigarettes, specifically one or more packs per day.
The frequency of trying marijuana or any cannabis product once or twice.
The frequency of using marijuana or any cannabis product once a month or more.
The frequency of drinking one or two drinks of an alcoholic beverage nearly every day.

relationships.description: Indicates the frequency of smoking cigarettes in the past 30 days.
Indicates the frequency of trying marijuana or any cannabis product once or twice in the past 30 days.
Indicates the frequency of using marijuana or any cannabis product once a month or more in the past 30 days.
Indicates the frequency of drinking one or two drinks of an alcoholic beverage nearly every day.
